
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/p/18718693" title="发布于 2025-02-17 08:21">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">本地部署DeepSeek后，没有好看的交互界面怎么行！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p><strong>大家好，我是晓凡。</strong></p>
<h3 id="写在前面">写在前面</h3>
<p>在前面的文章中手摸手的带小伙伴们在本地部署了<code>DeepSeek</code>。但是，部署完之后，我们要与之交互，只能在命令行中进行。</p>
<p>忘记怎么部署的小伙伴，来这儿复习一下~</p>
<p>命令行交互如下图所示，</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025315-699619349.png" alt="与deepseek命令行交互" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>这样的交互界面对于普通人来说可谓是非常的不友好。<code>DeepSeek</code>是好东西，当然得给他配一个高颜值的交互界面了，得让它集才华与美貌于一身。</p>
<p>所以，今天给大家推荐几款市面上好用且好看的交互界面，小伙伴们根据喜好自行选择一款即可~</p>
<h3 id="一page-assist-浏览器插件">一、Page Assist 浏览器插件</h3>
<p><code>Page Assist</code> 在之前部署<code>DeepSeek</code> 文章中用到过。晓凡个人用起来感觉挺不错的，界面简洁美观。</p>
<p>1、 开源地址</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/n4ze3m/page-assist" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/n4ze3m/page-assist</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025311-429801684.png" alt="Page Assist开源地址" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>该项目目前已有<strong>4.7k stars</strong>。</p>
<p>2、 下载安装</p>
<p>① 小伙伴可以到GitHub 下载</p>
<blockquote>
<p>插件支持主流浏览器，edge、chrome、firefox</p>
</blockquote>
<p><a href="https://github.com/n4ze3m/page-assist/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/n4ze3m/page-assist/releases</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025379-1583233911.png" alt="下载page-assist" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>② 可以到谷歌插件市场下载安装（需要魔法上网）</p>
<p>③ 上面两种方法都下载不了的小伙伴到如下地址下载</p>
<p><a href="https://www.crxsoso.com/webstore/detail/jfgfiigpkhlkbnfnbobbkinehhfdhndo" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.crxsoso.com/webstore/detail/jfgfiigpkhlkbnfnbobbkinehhfdhndo</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025406-1363436961.png" alt="下载插件" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>3、运行效果</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025438-44414599.png" alt="page-assist" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="二open-webui">二、Open WebUI</h3>
<blockquote>
<p><code>Open WebUI</code> 是一个<a href="https://docs.openwebui.com/features/plugin/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">可扩展的</a>、功能丰富、用户友好的自托管 AI 平台，专为完全离线运行而设计。它支持多种 LLM 运行环境，包括 <strong>Ollama</strong> 和 <strong>OpenAI 兼容的 API</strong>，并内置了用于 RAG 的<strong>推理引擎</strong>，是一个<strong>强大的 AI 部署解决方案</strong>。</p>
</blockquote>
<p>1、开源地址</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/open-webui/open-webui" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/open-webui/open-webui</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025368-1692477185.png" alt="open WebUI" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>该项目目前已有<strong>74.6k stars</strong> 。就凭这个⭐ 数，就知道小伙伴有多中意它了。</p>
<p>2、下载安装</p>
<blockquote>
<p>需要使用docker安装，小伙伴们可以参考下面中文官方文档安装</p>
</blockquote>
<p><a href="https://openwebui-doc-zh.pages.dev/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://openwebui-doc-zh.pages.dev/</a></p>
<p>3、运行效果</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025656-932775652.gif" alt="img" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="三chatbox">三、chatbox</h3>
<p>1、开源地址</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/Bin-Huang/chatbox" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/Bin-Huang/chatbox</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025463-1630642530.png" alt="chatbox 开源地址" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>该项目目前已有<strong>30.7k stars</strong>。 这个⭐⭐ 数也是不少了</p>
<p>2、下载安装</p>
<p>① 小伙伴们可以通过官网下载</p>
<p><a href="https://chatboxai.app/zh#download" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://chatboxai.app/zh#download</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025438-1124364174.png" alt="chatbox下载安装" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>支持桌面应用和移动应用</p>
<p>② 也可以到GitHub 下载</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/Bin-Huang/chatbox/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/Bin-Huang/chatbox/releases</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025406-113358064.png" alt="GitHub下载" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>3、运行效果</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2381533/202502/2381533-20250216202025578-745041174.gif" alt="img" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="四nextchat">四、NextChat</h3>
<p>1、开源地址</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/ChatGPTNextWeb/NextChat" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/ChatGPTNextWeb/NextChat</a></p>
<p><img src="http://blog.xiezhrspace.cn/blog-img/image-20250216111301784.png" alt="NextChat 开源地址" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>该项目目前已有<strong>80.7k stars</strong> 。 这⭐⭐ 也是挺高</p>
<p>2、下载安装</p>
<p>小伙伴可在GitHub 下载即可，或者直接使用网页版本。</p>
<p>GitHub下载地址：<a href="https://github.com/ChatGPTNextWeb/NextChat/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/ChatGPTNextWeb/NextChat/releases</a></p>
<p><img src="http://blog.xiezhrspace.cn/blog-img/image-20250216111816606.png" alt="NextChat 下载" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>3、运行效果</p>
<p><img src="http://blog.xiezhrspace.cn/blog-img/image-20250216112144935.png" alt="选择大模型" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="http://blog.xiezhrspace.cn/blog-img/image-20250216112114122.png" alt="对话界面" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="五anything-llm">五、anything-llm</h3>
<p>1、开源地址</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm</a></p>
<p><img src="http://blog.xiezhrspace.cn/blog-img/image-20250216112324958.png" alt="anything-llm 开源地址" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>2、下载安装</p>
<p>① GitHub 下载</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm/releases</a></p>
<p><img src="http://blog.xiezhrspace.cn/blog-img/image-20250216112435276.png" alt="anything-llm GitHub下载" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>② anythingllm 官网下载</p>
<p><a href="https://anythingllm.com/desktop" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://anythingllm.com/desktop</a></p>
<p><img src="http://blog.xiezhrspace.cn/blog-img/image-20250216112543336.png" alt="官网下载下载" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>3、运行效果</p>
<p><img src="http://blog.xiezhrspace.cn/blog-img/image-20250216112825251.png" alt="anything-llm 运行效果" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="六小结">六、小结</h3>
<p>以上分享的五款工具，是晓凡觉得市面上还不错的<code>DeepSeek</code>AI辅助工具，界面简洁，而且开源，并且在GitHub上获得了可观的⭐。</p>
<p>如果小伙伴们发现或者用着更好的工具欢迎评论区留言，分享给大家~</p>
<p>本期内容到这就结束了，希望对您有所帮助。</p>
<p>我们下期再见 ヾ(•ω•`)o  (●'◡'●)</p>
